Account Executive

Remote / full-time

Required Skills & Experience

  • Selling SaaS Products
  • Prospecting and closing
  • Meeting & exceeding quotas
  • Proficient with Salesforce CRM
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Fast-learner
  • Motivated
  • Organizational Skills

Bonus Points

  • Experience in automotive industry
  • Knowledge of automotive tech companies (website providers, inventory providers, etc.)
  • Proficient in Microsoft Excel

Compensation

  • Competitive base salary based on experience
  • Uncapped commission
  • Equity
  • Quarterly bonuses
